### Posts

- **[NFL Defensive Rankings Using EPA](https://twitter.com/Landeros_p33/status/1322211948084252673)**  
  - Created visualizations evaluating NFL defensive performance using Expected Points Added (EPA), highlighting defensive efficiency across teams.

- **[Predicting Liga MX Outcomes with Poisson and Expected Goals](https://twitter.com/Landeros_p33/status/1524519416477663234)**  
  - Applied Poisson distributions combined with betting odds and Expected Goals metrics to forecast match outcomes in Liga MX quarter-finals.

- **[Analyzing NFL Entertainment Trends](https://twitter.com/Landeros_p33/status/1453475387858685954)**  
  - Conducted an analysis revealing the NFL’s increased entertainment value over the past two decades, based on play-by-play data.

- **[Monte Carlo Simulations for Soccer Comeback Probabilities](https://twitter.com/Landeros_p33/status/1336383488531046405)**  
  - Used Monte Carlo simulations and Poisson modeling to calculate comeback probabilities, aligning predictions closely with betting markets.

- **[English Premier League Performance Analysis](https://twitter.com/Landeros_p33/status/1306623919479291914)**  
  - Extended baseball’s Pythagorean win theorem to soccer, analyzing EPL teams' performance against expected outcomes based on goal differentials.

- **[Probability Modeling in Everyday Scenarios](https://twitter.com/Landeros_p33/status/1503728975323045890)**  
  - Explored real-world probability problems, such as elevator usage scenarios, using statistical modeling and simulations.
